value.title: #38 Change currency using a slicer - Power BI Tips & Tricks #48
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to change currencies using a slicer. The user will be able to convert sales to different currencies by choosing a currency from a slicer. value.title: DAX Fridays! #14: SUMMARIZE
